pull.title: Replace struct update_fee_delta with lambda
pull.body:
The same was done for another struct in e177fcab3831b6d259da5164cabedcc9e78f6957.

Also, change type of feeDelta from int64_t to CAmount.

events.message: Use CAmount for fee delta and modified fee

events.body: I didn't touch the other structs, as they take multiple arguments. I think before touching them, we should ideally decide whether to use designated initializers or clang-tidy named arguments.
